q_en: What are the sewing tasks for Dress's product type?

steps.sql: SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'Dress';
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs for products of type "Dress"

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.start_time, st.end_time, st.planned_number, st.completed_number, st.status, wg.name AS working_group_name FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE op.product_id IN (5, 13, 21, 29);
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks associated with the product IDs obtained in Step1

response:
